item.title: Good old friend - THCon 2021
item.author: cryptax
item.description: Good old friend The challenge provides an Android APK. Reversing the APK The main activity of this APK is party.thcon.y2021.level1.MainActivity. Its onCreate() method does the following: Anti-debug. If the app is being debugged, display an alert dialog saying “Find another way” and quit. 1 2 3 if((this.getApplicationInfo().flags & 2) != 0) { this.findanotherway("App is debuggable"); } Anti-root. Search for su in the PATH of the system.
